tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE irrigation_pattern ( 
id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
sensor_id INT, 
location VARCHAR(255), 
moisture_level DECIMAL, 
water_usage DECIMAL, 
irrigation_time TIME 
);

CREATE TABLE IrrigationDetails (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR,
    water_source VARCHAR,
    water_usage DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE FieldData (
    field_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_type VARCHAR,
    planting_date DATE,
    irrigation_schedule JSON,
    soil_moisture DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    field_id UUID,
    sensor_type VARCHAR,
    sensor_value DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    zone_id INT,
    day_of_week TEXT,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);
